name: pulumi-az-pipeline-task
description: Azure Pipelines task extension for running Pulumi apps.

scripts.package: npm --prefix buildAndReleaseTask/ run tsc && npm --prefix buildAndReleaseTask/ bump-version && npm run tfx-create
scripts.start: npm --prefix buildAndReleaseTask/ run tsc && node buildAndReleaseTask/index.js

author: Pulumi
